natural solution: Since $15$ and $6$ have a common factor of $3,$ we can simplify: $$\frac{15}{6}=\frac{3\cdot 5}{3\cdot 2}=\frac{\cancel{3}\cdot 5}{\cancel{3}\cdot 2}=\boxed{\frac{5}{2}}.$$
